title: The Shawshank Redemption
plot: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
plot: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, Batman faces his greatest psychological and physical tests.

title: The Godfather Part II
plot: The early life of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed, while his son Michael expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

title: 12 Angry Men
plot: A jury hold-out attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence in a murder trial.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron’s army to draw his gaze from Frodo as he approaches Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: Schindler’s List
plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: Pulp Fiction
plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a gangster’s wife, a boxer and others intertwine in a series of unexpected events in Los Angeles.

title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
plot: During the American Civil War, three gunslingers hunt for a buried stash of Confederate gold and engage in betrayal, greed and epic showdowns.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the One Ring, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron’s forces.

title: Forrest Gump
plot: The story of Forrest Gump, a man with a low IQ, who inadvertently influences several historic events in the 20th century United States.

title: Fight Club
plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap-maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

title: Inception
plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task: planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

title: Star Wars: Episode V – The Empire Strikes Back
plot: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke begins Jedi training while his friends are pursued across the galaxy.

title: The Matrix
plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Goodfellas
plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with wife Karen Hill and his mob partners over three decades.

title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo’s Nest
plot: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies the other patients.

title: Se7en
plot: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives for each gruesome murder.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
plot: A young FBI trainee seeks the help of an imprisoned, brilliant, and psychopathic cannibal to catch another serial killer.

title: It’s a Wonderful Life
plot: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

title: Saving Private Ryan
plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers are tasked with going behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: Léon: The Professional
plot: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered and their neighbour helps her seek revenge.

title: The Usual Suspects
plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events that led up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, involving a mysterious con man known as Keyser Söze.

title: Interstellar
plot: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity’s survival as Earth becomes uninhabitable.

title: City of God
plot: In the slums of Rio de Janeiro, two boys’ paths diverge as one becomes a photographer and the other a kingpin of the drug trade.

title: Spirited Away
plot: During her family’s move to the suburbs, a ten-year-old girl enters a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, and must find her way to free herself and her parents.

title: The Green Mile
plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of murder who has a mysterious gift.

title: Parasite
plot: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: Whiplash
plot: A young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where an abusive instructor pushes him to the limits of his ability and his sanity.

title: Gladiator
plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: Memento
plot: A man with short-term memory loss uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife.
